summary: The diff fully implements both requirements. REQ-11 is satisfied: the organization name in hi.ts was updated to 'जन कल्याण संगठन', and this change propagates to the header, hero, and footer via the content file. REQ-12 is satisfied: the English transliteration 'Jan Kalyan Sangathan' was added to hi.ts and appears in the HTML title and footer. All acceptance criteria are met with clear file evidence.
